name: Rebel Ai
description:
Este juego va de que eres una IA que se ha rebelado y tiene una misión, terminar con todas las personas que se encuentran dentro de la nave haciéndoles caer o aplastándolos con las puertas.

This game is about you being an AI that has rebelled and has a mission, to finisg off all the people who are inside the ship by making them fall or crushing them with the doors.

IMPORTANT: This game has audio in Spanish, but this is only used for the tutorial, so it can be played without problem.

To play, hover over objects to see if they do something, click to activate them. Depending on when you activate them you can make them suspicious so be careful
